parameters.name: BFIELDRTN
parameters.description: Magnetic field vector in RTN coordinates from the IMPACT/MAG instrument.

parameters.name: BTOTAL
parameters.description: Total magnetic field from the IMPACT/MAG instrument.

parameters.name: HAE
parameters.description: Spacecraft position in Heliocentric Aries Ecliptic (HAE) coordinates.

parameters.name: HEE
parameters.description: Spacecraft position in Heliocentric Earth Ecliptic (HEE) coordinates.

parameters.name: HEEQ
parameters.description: Spacecraft position in Heliocentric Earth Equatorial (HEEQ) coordinates.

parameters.name: CARR
parameters.description: Spacecraft position in Carrington Heliographic coordinates.

parameters.name: HCI
parameters.description: Heliocentric Inertial

parameters.name: R
parameters.description: Distance of STEREO from the Sun.

parameters.name: Np
parameters.description: Solar wind proton number density

parameters.name: Vp
parameters.description: Proton Bulk Speed from the PLASTIC instrument.

parameters.name: Tp
parameters.description: Proton Temperature from the PLASTIC instrument.

parameters.name: Vth
parameters.description: Proton Thermal Speed from the PLASTIC instrument.

parameters.name: Vr_Over_V_RTN
parameters.description: Direction cosine of radial velocity from the PLASTIC instrument.

parameters.name: Vt_Over_V_RTN
parameters.description: Direction cosine of tangential velocity from the PLASTIC instrument.

parameters.name: Vn_Over_V_RTN
parameters.description: Direction cosine of normal velocity from the PLASTIC instrument.

parameters.name: Vp_RTN
parameters.description: Solar Wind Proton Speed

parameters.name: Entropy
parameters.description: Entropy

parameters.name: Beta
parameters.description: Beta

parameters.name: Total_Pressure
parameters.description: Total Pressure

parameters.name: Cone_Angle
parameters.description: Cone Angle of magnetic field with respect to R direction (0 for anti-sunward, 180 for sunward)

parameters.name: Clock_Angle
parameters.description: Clock Angle of B-field in the T-N plane (atan2(BT,BN)). 0 along T. 90 along N.

parameters.name: Magnetic_Pressure
parameters.description: Magnetic Pressure

parameters.name: Dynamic_Pressure
parameters.description: Dynamic Pressure
